ResistanceFeature.Name: Periapt of Proof against Poison
ResistanceFeature.Text: This delicate silver chain has a brilliant-cut black gem pendant. While you wear it, poisons have no effect on you. You are immune to the poisoned condition and have immunity to poison damage.
